Package net.minecraft.item

Interface Wearable

All Superinterfaces:
Vanishable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSkullBlock, ArmorItem, CarvedPumpkinBlock, DyeableArmorItem, ElytraItem, PlayerSkullBlock, SkullBlock, WallPlayerSkullBlock, WallSkullBlock, WallWitherSkullBlock, WitherSkullBlock
public interface Wearable
extends Vanishable
Represents a type of item that is wearable in an armor equipment slot.

This type of item can be targeted by the minecraft:binding_curse enchantment.
